name: qa-studio
description: D365 QA Studio - Playwright-Powered Test Recorder, Locator Cleaner, Runner, and Debugger

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:ui
scripts.prebuild: npm run build:clean && node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = 'dist/main/services/reporters/ErrorGrabber.js'; const destDir = 'runtime/reporters'; const dest = path.join(destDir, 'ErrorGrabber.js'); if (fs.existsSync(src)) { fs.mkdirSync(destDir, { recursive: true }); fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('Copied ErrorGrabber.js to runtime/reporters/'); } else { console.log('ErrorGrabber.js not found, skipping copy'); }"
scripts.build:clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs-extra'); const dir = 'runtime/reporters'; if (fs.existsSync(dir)) { try { fs.removeSync(dir); } catch (e) { if (e.code === 'EBUSY') { console.warn('Directory locked, retrying in 500ms...'); const start = Date.now(); while (Date.now() - start < 500) {} try { fs.removeSync(dir); } catch (e2) { console.error('Failed after retry:', e2.message); throw e2; } } else { throw e; } } }"
scripts.build:win: npm run build:app && npm run prebuild && npm run setup:runtime && electron-builder --win --x64
scripts.build:win:arm64: npm run build:app && npm run prebuild && npm run setup:runtime && electron-builder --win --arm64
scripts.build:mac: npm run build:app && npm run prebuild && npm run setup:runtime && electron-builder --mac
scripts.dist:mac: npm run build:app && npm run prebuild && npm run setup:runtime && electron-builder --mac --dir
scripts.dist:win:arm64: npm run build:app && npm run prebuild && npm run setup:runtime && electron-builder --win --arm64 --dir
scripts.dev: tsc && npm run build:ui && electron dist/main/index.js
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd src/ui && npm install
scripts.dist: npm run build:app && npm run setup:runtime && electron-builder
scripts.dist:win: npm run build:app && npm run setup:runtime && electron-builder --win --dir
scripts.dist:win:portable: npm run build:app && npm run setup:runtime && electron-builder --win portable
scripts.dist:win:safe: powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File scripts/clean-release.ps1 && npm run build:app && npm run setup:runtime && electron-builder --win --dir
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:ui && npm run test:e2e
scripts.ci:local: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm test
scripts.ci:full: npm run ci:local && npm run test:e2e
scripts.dist:test: npm run build:app && npm run setup:runtime && electron-builder --dir
